title: Bug 14680Compare unreadable in high contrast black
description: If you are in High Contrast Black the differences in the Compare browser areshown in Grey  this is unreadable with White text.STEPS1) Change your system colors to High Contrast Black2) Compare two editions of a project from a repository3) Select one of the differences  all of the highlights are shown with a greybackground which is unreadable with white text.
